message.content: {"id": "124610", "title": "Bug 124610 - Add a filter on a boolean computed column will cause error.", "description": "When attempting to add a filter on a boolean computed column, an error is encountered. The expected result is for the filter to work without any issues. However, the actual result is an error message stating 'data.engine.ConvertToDataTypeError' with the details revealing that the boolean value cannot be converted to class 'java.lang.Boolean'.", "OB": "When the bug occurs, the user should save and preview the report. The filter should function as expected without any errors.", "EB": "The current behavior is that when trying to apply a filter on a boolean computed column, an error is thrown and the filter does not work. The error message displayed is 'data.engine.ConvertToDataTypeError' with the details specifying that the boolean value cannot be converted to class 'java.lang.Boolean'.", "SR": "The bug should be fixed so that filters can be applied successfully on boolean computed columns without any data conversion errors."}

origin.input_content:
